short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To use, type '#' <space> and a ticket number or a search query into the Omnibox. Remember to configure Trac URL in options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin lets you access your Trac tickets by using a few quick keyboard shortcuts to access your Trac tickets by number or you can even perform a search query.

First, configure the URL to your Trac installation in the plugin options.

Keyboard sequence:
- <Ctrl>-T or <Ctrl>-L
- #
- <Tab> or <Space>
- <Ticket number> ex: 123, or <query> ex: summer
